refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the activity of the constraints in the solution

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Get the activity of the constraints in the solution.
This function may fail if the problem has not been solved already. Use sym_solve() in this case.

refsection.title: Return value
refsection.para: Returns a matrix with 1 column and number of rows equal to number of constraints, that represents the activities of those constraints
